name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.maintenance.replication.min
description: Minimal live block replication in existence of maintenance mode.

name: dfs.client.write.byte-array-manager.count-limit
description: The maximum number of arrays allowed for each array length.

name: mapreduce.client.submit.file.replication
description:
The replication level for submitted job files.  This
  should be around the square root of the number of nodes.

name: dfs.namenode.quota.init-threads
description:
The number of concurrent threads to be used in quota initialization. The
    speed of quota initialization also affects the namenode fail-over latency.
    If the size of name space is big, try increasing this to 16 or higher.

name: hadoop.security.uid.cache.secs
description:
This is the config controlling the validity of the entries in the cache
        containing the userId to userName and groupId to groupName used by
        NativeIO getFstat().

name: io.file.buffer.size
description:
The size of buffer for use in sequence files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: fs.ftp.host.port
description: FTP filesystem connects to fs.ftp.host on this port
